name: Grass Valley
overview: Grass Valley name has been synonymous with innovation, leadership, and performance. With an eye to the future, they are committed to advancing their industry by being a strategic and trusted partner. Leveraging IP technology with their proprietary knowledge of media processing and storage, they develop product and service solutions that deliver unmatched interoperability and financial efficiency, and have the flexibility to change and grow as business evolves. Grass Valley’s partners—global broadcasters, teleproduction facilities, and service providers, as well as independent video professionals—rely on their solutions to cover the world’s most high-profile live events, and benefit every day from their operational efficiency. When you’re watching news, sports, or entertainment programming—whether on a TV, the web, or a mobile device you’re watching Grass Valley at work in today’s connected world.
